name: The Arborec

abilities.name: Mitosis
abilities.description: Your space docks cannot produce infantry. At the start of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

promissoryNote.name: Stymie
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Arborec player cannot produce units in or adjacent to non-home systems that contain 1 or more of your units. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Arborec player's units, return this card to the Arborec player.

leaders.name: Letani Ospha
leaders.title: Arborec Agent
leaders.ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship; that player may replace that ship with one from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship.

leaders.name: Dirzuga Rophal
leaders.title: Arborec Commander
leaders.ability: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units that have PRODUCTION: You may produce 1 unit in that system.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have 12 Ground Forces on Planets you control.

leaders.name: Letani Miasmiala
leaders.title: Ultrasonic Emitter
leaders.ability: ACTION: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Letani Behemoth
mech.description: DEPLOY: When you would use your MITOSIS faction ability you may replace 1 of your infantry with 1 mech from your reinforcements instead. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. PRODUCTION 2. PLANETARY SHIELD.

flavorText: Do you hear, flesh-thing? The harmonies of the Arborec? Your golems of metal and noise and fire have deafened you to the symphony.

name: The Barony of Letnev

abilities.name: Munitions Reserves
abilities.description: At the start of each round of space combat, you may spend 2 trade goods; you may re-roll any number of your dice during that combat round.

abilities.name: Armada
abilities.description: The maximum number of non-fighter ships you can have in each system is equal to 2 more than the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

promissoryNote.name: War Funding
promissoryNote.description: At the start of a round of space combat: The Letnev player loses 2 trade goods. During this combat round, re-roll any number of your dice. Then, return this card to the Letnev player.

leaders.name: Viscount Unlenn
leaders.title: Barony Agent
leaders.ability: At the start of a Space Combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system. That ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.

leaders.name: Rear Admiral Farran
leaders.title: Barony Commander
leaders.ability: After 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE: You may gain 1 Trade Good.

leaders.name: Darktalon Treilla
leaders.title: Dark Matter Affinity
leaders.ability: ACTION: Place this card near the game board; the number of non-fighter ships you can have in systems is not limited by laws or by the number of command tokens in your fleet pool during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

mech.name: Dunlain Reaper
mech.description: DEPLOY: At the start of a round of ground combat, you may spend 2 resources to replace 1 of your infantry in that combat with 1 mech. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: Hold your fire until the main fleet arrives. Our armada will blot out their sunâ€”when they die, they will die in darkness!

name: The Clan of Saar

abilities.name: Scavenge
abilities.description: After you gain control of a planet, gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: Nomadic
abilities.description: You can score objectives even if you do not control the planets in your home system.

promissoryNote.name: Ragh's Call
promissoryNote.description: After you commit 1 or more units to land on a planet: Remove all of the Saar player's ground forces from that planet and place them on a planet controlled by the Saar player. Then, return this card to the Saar player.

leaders.name: Captain Mendosa
leaders.title: Saar Agent
leaders.ability: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to increase the move value of 1 of that player's ships to match the move value of the ship on the game board that has the highest move value.

leaders.name: Rowl Sarrig
leaders.title: Saar Commander
leaders.ability: When you produce fighters or infantry: You may place each of those units at any of your space docks that are not blockaded.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have 3 space docks on the game board

leaders.name: Gurno Aggero
leaders.title: Armageddon Relay
leaders.ability: ACTION: Choose 1 system that is adjacent to 1 of your space docks. Destroy all other player's infantry and fighters in that system. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Scavenger Zeta
mech.description: DEPLOY: After you gain control of a planet, you may spend 1 trade good to place 1 mech on that planet. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: O, Lisis, you whose fate is forever carved into the backs of the weary. Your spectre is all we see.

name: The Embers of Muaat

abilities.name: Star Forge
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place either 2 fighters or 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your war suns.

abilities.name: Gashlai Physiology
abilities.description: Your ships can move through supernovas.

promissoryNote.name: Fires of the Gashlai
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Remove 1 token from the Muaat player's fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements. Then, gain your war sun unit upgrade technology card. Then, return this card to the Muaat player.

leaders.name: Umbat
leaders.title: Muaat Agent
leaders.ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may produce up to 2 units that each have a cost of 4 or less in a system that contains one of their war suns or their flagship.

leaders.name: Magmus
leaders.title: Muaat Commander
leaders.ability: After you spend a token from your strategy pool: You may gain 1 trade good.

leaders.name: Adjudicator Ba'al
leaders.title: Nova Seed
leaders.ability: After you move a war sun into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex: You may destroy all other players' units in that system and replace that system tile with the Muaat supernova tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

mech.name: Ember Colossus
mech.description: When you use your STAR FORGE faction ability in this system or an adjacent system, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements with this unit. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: No longer will the Gashlai be shackled by your whims. Be extinguished, now, and know that you have lost.

name: The Emirates of Hacan

abilities.name: Masters of Trade
abilities.description: You do not have to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the "Trade" strategy card.

abilities.name: Guild Ships
abilities.description: You can negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor.

abilities.name: Arbiters
abilities.description: When you are negotiating a transaction, action cards can be exchanged as part of that transaction.

promissoryNote.name: Trade Convoys
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Hacan player's units, return this card to the Hacan player.

leaders.name: Carth of Golden Sands
leaders.title: Hacan Agent
leaders.ability: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.

leaders.name: Gila the Silvertongue
leaders.title: Hacan Commander
leaders.ability: When you cast votes: You may spend any number of trade goods; cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

leaders.name: Harrugh Gefhara
leaders.title: Galactic Securities Net
leaders.ability: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may reduce the cost of each of your units to 0 during this use of PRODUCTION. If you do, purge this card.

mech.name: Pride of Kenara
mech.description: This planet's card may be traded as part of a transaction; if you do, move all of your units from this planet to another planet you control. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: Elder Qanoj. I have heard the Xxcha's work to restore Archon Tau has run short of resources. Perhaps the Emirates may be of some assistance?

name: The Federation of Sol

abilities.name: Orbital Drop
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet you control.

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.description: When you gain command tokens during the status phase, gain 1 additional command token.

promissoryNote.name: Military Support
promissoryNote.description: At the start of the Sol player's turn: Remove 1 token from the Sol player's strategy pool, if able, and return it to their reinforcements. Then, you may place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control. Then, return this card to the Sol player.

leaders.name: Evelyn Delouis
leaders.title: Sol Agent
leaders.ability: At the start of a ground combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ground force in the active system; that ground force rolls 1 additional die during that combat round.

leaders.name: Claire Gibson
leaders.title: Sol Commander
leaders.ability: At the start of a ground combat on a planet you control: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.
leaders.unlockCondition: Control planets that have a combined total of at least 12 resources.

leaders.name: Jace X. 4th Air Legion
leaders.title: Helio Command Array
leaders.ability: ACTION: Remove each of your command tokens from the game board and return them to your reinforcements. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: ZS Thunderbolt M2
mech.description: DEPLOY: After you use your ORBITAL DROP faction ability, you may spend 3 resources to place 1 mech on that planet. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: Our enemies consider us children. They think us weak. Show them. Show them what the children of Jord can do!

name: The Ghosts of Creuss

abilities.name: Quantum Entanglement
abilities.description: You treat all systems that contain either an alpha or beta wormhole as adjacent to each other. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

abilities.name: Slipstream
abilities.description: During your tactical actions, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system or in a system that contains either an alpha or beta wormhole.

abilities.name: Creuss Gate
abilities.description: When you create the game board, place the Creuss Gate (tile 17) where your home system would normally be placed. The Creuss Gate system is not a home system. Then, place your home system (tile 51) in your play area.

promissoryNote.name: Creuss Iff
promissoryNote.description: At the start of your turn during the action phase: Place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships. Then, return this card to the Creuss player.

leaders.name: Emissary Taivra
leaders.title: Creuss Agent
leaders.ability: After a player activates a system that contains a non-delta wormhole: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain a wormhole during this tactical action.

leaders.name: Sai Seravus
leaders.title: Creuss Commander
leaders.ability: After your ships move: For each ship that has a capacity value and moved through 1 or more wormholes, you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcements with that ship if you have unused capacity in the active system.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have units in 3 systems that contain alpha or beta wormholes.

leaders.name: Riftwalker Meian
leaders.title: Singularity Reactor
leaders.ability: ACTION: Swap the positions of any 2 systems that contain wormholes or your units, other than the Creuss system and the Wormhole Nexus. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Icarus Drive
mech.description: After any player activates a system, you may remove this unit from the game board to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into this system. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: When you leave the familiar safety of your universe, you enter our domain. I suggest you do not trespass here lightly.

name: The L1Z1X Mindnet

abilities.name: Assimilate
abilities.description: When you gain control of a planet, replace each PDS and space dock that is on that planet with a matching unit from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Harrow
abilities.description: At the end of each round of ground combat, your ships in the active system may use their Bombardment abilities against your opponent's ground forces on the planet.

promissoryNote.name: Cybernetic Enhancements
promissoryNote.description: At the start of your turn: Remove 1 token from the L1Z1X player's strategy pool and return it to his reinforcements. Then, place 1 command token from your reinforcements in your strategy pool. Then, return this card to the L1Z1X player.

leaders.name: I48S
leaders.title: L1Z1X Agent
leaders.ability: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to replace 1 of their infantry in the active system with 1 mech from their reinforcements.

leaders.name: 2RAM
leaders.title: L1Z1X Commander
leaders.ability: Units that have PLANETARY SHIELD do not prevent you from using Bombardment.

leaders.name: The Helmsman
leaders.title: Dark Space Navigation
leaders.ability: ACTION: Choose 1 system that does not contain other players' ships; you may move your flagship and any number of your dreadnoughts from other systems into the chosen system. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Annihilator
mech.description: While not participating in ground combat, this unit can use its BOMBARDMENT ability on planets in its system as if it were a ship. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. BOMBARDMENT 8.

flavorText: For the other races, every soldier killed on the battlefield is a loss. For we L1Z1X, every soldier killed is a chance to resurrect them into a form even more powerful than before.

name: The Mentak Coalition

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: At the start of a space combat, you may roll 1 die for each of up to 2 of your cruisers or destroyers in the system. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign it to 1 of their ships.

abilities.name: Pillage
abilities.description: After 1 of your neighbors gains trade goods or resolves a transaction, if they have 3 or more trade goods, you may take 1 of their trade goods or commodities.

promissoryNote.name: Promise of Protection
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Mentak player cannot use their Pillage faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Mentak player's units, return this card to the Mentak player.

leaders.name: Suffi An
leaders.title: Mentak Agent
leaders.ability: After the PILLAGE faction ability is used against another player: You may exhaust this card; if you do, you and that player each draw 1 action card.

leaders.name: S'Ula Mentarion
leaders.title: Mentak Commander
leaders.ability: After you win a space combat: You may force your opponent to give you 1 promissory note from their hand.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have 4 cruisers on the game board

leaders.name: Ipswitch, Loose Cannon
leaders.title: Sleeper Cell
leaders.ability: At the start of space combat that you are participating in: You may purge this card; if you do, for each other player's ship that is destroyed during this combat, place 1 ship of that type from your reinforcements in the active system.

mech.name: Moll Terminus
mech.description: Other players' ground forces on this planet cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: So to deliver these guns you're saying I need to get my ship around the Isofal Nebula and through the Charon Reefs, chart a new course through the Wraith Stars, then fight a couple Winnu battlewagons? And here I thought you were giving me a challenge!

name: The Naalu Collective

abilities.name: Telepathic
abilities.description: At the end of the strategy phase, place the Naalu "0" token on your strategy card; you are first in initiative order.

abilities.name: Foresight
abilities.description: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may place 1 token from your strategy pool in an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships; move your ships from the active system into that system.

promissoryNote.name: Gift of Prescience
promissoryNote.description: At the end of the strategy phase: Place this card face-up in your play area and place the Naalu "0" token on your strategy card; you are first in the initiative order. The Naalu player cannot use their TELEPATHIC faction ability during this game round. Return this card to the Naalu player at the end of the status phase.

leaders.name: Z'eu
leaders.title: Naalu Agent
leaders.ability: After an agenda is revealed: You may exhaust this card to look at the top card of the agenda deck. Then, you may show that card to 1 other player.

leaders.name: M'aban
leaders.title: Naalu Commander
leaders.ability: You may produce 1 additional fighter for their cost; these additional units do not count against your production limit.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have 12 fighters on the game board

leaders.name: The Oracle
leaders.title: C-Radium Geometry
leaders.ability: At the end of the status phase: You may force each other player to give you 1 promissory note from their hand. If you do, purge this card.

mech.name: Iconoclast
mech.description: During combat against an opponent who has at least 1 relic fragment, apply +2 to the results of this unit's combat rolls. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: ...and that's why the Letnev will never cooperate with the Shikrai zealots and extremists!

name: The Nekro Virus

abilities.name: Galactic Threat
abilities.description: You cannot vote on agendas. Once per agenda phase, after an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 1 technology that is owned by a player who voted how you predicted.

abilities.name: Technological Singularity
abilities.description: Once per combat, after 1 of your opponent's units is destroyed, you may gain 1 technology that is owned by that player.

abilities.name: Propagation
abilities.description: You cannot research technology. When you would research a technology, gain 3 command tokens instead.

promissoryNote.name: Antivirus
promissoryNote.description: At the start of a combat: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Nekro player cannot use their TECHNOLOGICAL SINGULARITY faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Nekro player's units, return this card to the Nekro player.

leaders.name: Nekro Malleon
leaders.title: Nekro Virus Agent
leaders.ability: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may discard 1 action card or spend 1 command token from their command sheet to gain 2 trade goods.

leaders.name: Nekro Acidos
leaders.title: Nekro Virus Commander
leaders.ability: After you gain a technology: You may draw 1 action card.
leaders.unlockCondition: Own 3 technologies. A "Valefar Assimilator" technology counts only if its X or Y token is on a technology.

leaders.name: UNIT.DSGN.FLAYESH
leaders.title: Polymorphic Algorithm
leaders.ability: ACTION: Choose a planet that has a technology specialty in a system that contains your units. Destroy any other player's units on that planet. Gain trade goods equal to that planet's combined resource and influence values and gain 1 technology that matches the specialty of that planet. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Mordred
mech.description: During combat against an opponent who has an "X" or "Y" token on 1 or more of their technologies, apply +2 to the result of each of this unit's combat rolls. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: The Alastor
flagship.special: At the start of a space combat, choose any number of your ground forces in this system to participate in that combat as if they were ships.

flavorText: Once Ordinian was a paradise world with windswept plains and shining white cities. Now it is a wasteland of bare rock under a gray sky, haunted by black-armored metal nightmares.

name: Sardakk N'orr

abilities.name: Unrelenting
abilities.description: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

promissoryNote.name: Tekklar Legion
promissoryNote.description: At the start of an invasion combat: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat. If your opponent is the N'orr player, apply -1 to the result of each of his unit's combat rolls during this combat. Then, return this card to the N'orr player.

leaders.name: T'ro
leaders.title: Sardakk N'orr Agent
leaders.ability: At the end of a player's tactical action: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place 2 infantry from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system.

leaders.name: G'hom Sek'kus
leaders.title: Sardakk N'orr Commander
leaders.ability: During the "Commit Ground Forces" step: You can commit up to 1 ground force from each planet in the active system and each planet in adjacent systems that do not contain 1 of your command tokens.

leaders.name: Sh'val, Harbinger
leaders.title: Tekklar Conditioning
leaders.ability: After you move ships into the active system: You may skip directly to the "Commit Ground Forces" step. If you do, after you commit ground forces to land on planets, purge this card and return each of your ships in the active system to your reinforcements.

mech.name: Valkyrie Exoskeleton
mech.description: After this unit uses its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability during Ground Combat, it produces 1 hit against your opponent's ground forces on this planet. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: C'Morran N'orr
flagship.special: Apply +1 to the result of each of your other ship's combat rolls in this system.

flavorText: Broodmates! The Tekklar legions are feared by all our foes across the galaxy.

name: The Universities of Jol-Nar

abilities.name: Fragile
abilities.description: Apply -1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

abilities.name: Brilliant
abilities.description: When you spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the "Technology" strategy card, you may resolve the primary ability instead.

abilities.name: Analytical
abilities.description: When you research a technology that is not a unit upgrade technology, you may ignore 1 prerequisite.

promissoryNote.name: Research Agreement
promissoryNote.description: After the Jol-Nar player researches a technology that is not a faction technology: Gain that technology. Then, return this card to the Jol-Nar player.

leaders.name: Doctor Sucaban
leaders.title: Jol-Nar Agent
leaders.ability: When a player spends resources to research: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove any number of their infantry from the game board. For each unit removed, reduce the resources spent by 1.

leaders.name: Ta Zern
leaders.title: Jol-Nar Commander
leaders.ability: After you roll dice for a unit ability: You may reroll any of those dice.

leaders.name: Rin, The Master's Legacy
leaders.title: Genetic Memory
leaders.ability: ACTION: For each non-unit upgrade technology you own, you may replace that technology with any technology of the same color from the deck. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Shield Paling
mech.description: Your infantry on this planet are not affected by your FRAGILE faction ability. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: J.N.S. Hylarim
flagship.special: When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 2 additional hits.

flavorText: The creator of the Deepwrought Archives is famous for breaking the stranglehold the fractious universities had on information, and making knowledge available to all Hylar on Jol and Nar.

name: The Winnu

abilities.name: Blood Ties
abilities.description: You do not have to spend influence to remove the custodians token from Mecatol Rex.

abilities.name: Reclamation
abilities.description: After you resolve a tactical action during which you gained control of Mecatol Rex, you may place 1 PDS and 1 space dock from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

startingTechChoice: Choose any 1 technology that has no prerequisites.

promissoryNote.name: Acquiescence
promissoryNote.description: At the end of the strategy phase: Exchange 1 of your strategy cards with a strategy card that was chosen by the Winnu player. Then, return this card to the Winnu player.

leaders.name: Berekar Berekon
leaders.title: Winnu Agent
leaders.ability: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION: You may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 2.

leaders.name: Rickar Rickani
leaders.title: Winnu Commander
leaders.ability: During combat: Apply +2 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls in the Mecatol Rex system, your home system, and each system that contains a legendary planet.
leaders.unlockCondition: Control Mecatol Rex or enter into a combat in the Mecatol Rex system.

leaders.name: Mathis Mathinus
leaders.title: Imperial Seal
leaders.ability: ACTION: Perform the primary ability of any strategy card. Then, choose any number of other players. Those players may perform the secondary ability of that strategy card. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Reclaimer
mech.description: After you resolve a tactical action where you gained control of this planet, you may place 1 PDS or 1 Space Dock from your reinforcements on this planet. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Salai Sai Corian
flagship.special: When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls a number of dice equal to the number of your opponent's non-fighter ships in this system.

flavorText: You cannot enter. It is forbidden! We are the children of the Lazax. Nothing of theirs is forbidden to us.

name: The Xxcha Kingdom

abilities.name: Peace Accords
abilities.description: After you resolve the primary or secondary ability of the "Diplomacy" strategy card, you may gain control of 1 planet other than Mecatol Rex that does not contain any units and is in a system that is adjacent to a planet you control.

abilities.name: Quash
abilities.description: When an agenda is revealed, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool to discard that agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead.

promissoryNote.name: Political Favor
promissoryNote.description: When an agenda is revealed: Remove 1 token from the Xxcha player's strategy pool and return it to their reinforcements. Then, discard the revealed agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead. Then, return this card to the Xxcha player.

leaders.name: Ggrocuto Rinn
leaders.title: Xxcha Agent
leaders.ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to ready any planet; if that planet is in a system that is adjacent to a planet you control, you may remove 1 infantry from that planet and return it to its reinforcements.

leaders.name: Elder Qanoj
leaders.title: Xxcha Commander
leaders.ability: Each planet you exhaust to cast votes provides 1 additional vote. Game effects cannot prevent you from voting on an agenda.
leaders.unlockCondition: Control planets that have a combined value of at least 12 influence.

leaders.name: Xxekir Grom
leaders.title: Political Data Nexus
leaders.ability: ACTION: You may discard 1 law from play. Look at the top 5 cards of the agenda deck. Choose 2 to reveal, and resolve each as if you had cast 1 vote for an outcome of your choice; discard the rest. Other players cannot resolve abilities during this action. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Indomitus
mech.description: You may use this unit's Space Cannon ability against ships that are in adjacent systems. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. SPACE CANNON 8.

flagship.name: Loncara Ssodu
flagship.special: You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are in adjacent systems.

flavorText: The Xxcha have not forgotten the Twilight Wars. Though we may speak softly, you would not be wise to attempt to silence us!

name: The Yin Brotherhood

abilities.name: Indoctrination
abilities.description: At the start of a ground combat, you may spend 2 influence to replace 1 of your opponent's participating infantry with 1 infantry from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Devotion
abilities.description: After each space battle round, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships in that system.

promissoryNote.name: Greyfire Mutagen
promissoryNote.description: After a system is activated: The Yin player cannot use faction abilities or faction technology during this tactical action. Then, return this card to the Yin player.

leaders.name: Brother Milor
leaders.title: Yin Agent
leaders.ability: After a player's destroyer or cruiser is destroyed: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place up to 2 fighters from their reinforcements in that unit's system.

leaders.name: Brother Omar
leaders.title: Yin Commander
leaders.ability: This card satisfies a green technology prerequisite. You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your production limit.

leaders.name: Dannel of the Tenth
leaders.title: Spinner Overdrive
leaders.ability: ACTION: For each planet that contains any number of your infantry, either ready that planet or place an equal number of infantry from your reinforcements on that planet. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Moyin's Ashes
mech.description: DEPLOY: When you use your INDOCTRINATION faction ability, you may spend 1 additional influence to replace your opponent's unit with 1 mech instead of 1 infantry. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Van Hauge
flagship.special: When this ship is destroyed, destroy all ships in this system.

flavorText: Brother, our ships are breaking up. No! Have them launch the remaining fighters and board the enemy in the lifepods. In Darien's name, we fight to the last!

name: The Yssaril Tribes

abilities.name: Stall Tactics
abilities.description: ACTION: Discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Scheming
abilities.description: When you draw 1 or more action cards, draw 1 additional action card. Then, choose and discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Crafty
abilities.description: You can have any number of action cards in your hand. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

promissoryNote.name: Spy Net
promissoryNote.description: At the start of your turn: Look at the Yssaril player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand. Then, return this card to the Yssaril player.

leaders.name: Ssruu
leaders.title: Yssaril Agent
leaders.ability: This card has the text ability of each other player's agent, even if that agent is exhausted.

leaders.name: So Ata
leaders.title: Yssaril Commander
leaders.ability: After another player activates a system that contains your units: You may look at that player's action cards, promissory notes, or secret objectives.

leaders.name: Kyver, Blade and Key
leaders.title: Guild of Spies
leaders.ability: ACTION: Each other player shows you 1 action card from their hand. For each player, you may either take that card or force that player to discard 3 random action cards from their hand. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Blackshade Infiltrator
mech.description: DEPLOY: After you use your STALL TACTICS faction ability, you may place 1 mech on a planet you control. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Y'sia Y'ssrila
flagship.special: This ship can move through systems that contain other player's ships.

flavorText: The black shadow dropped from the skylight into the bedroom. 'This is Governor Singh,' the figure said in a voice that was not its own. 'On my authority, deactivate the defense grid.'

name: The Argent Flight

abilities.name: Zeal
abilities.description: You always vote first during the agenda phase. When you cast at least 1 vote, cast 1 additional vote for each player in the game including you.

abilities.name: Raid Formation
abilities.description: When 1 or more of your units uses ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, for each hit produced in excess of your opponent's fighters, choose 1 of your opponent's ships that has SUSTAIN DAMAGE to become damaged.

startingTechChoice: Choose two of the following: Neural Motivator, Sarween Tools, Plasma Scoring.

promissoryNote.name: Strike Wing Ambuscade
promissoryNote.description: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: Choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die. Then, return this card to the Argent player.

leaders.name: Trillossa Aun Mirik
leaders.title: Argent Flight Agent
leaders.ability: When a player produces ground forces in a system: You may exhaust this card; that player may place those units on any planets they control in that system and any adjacent systems.

leaders.name: Trrakan Aun Zulok
leaders.title: Argent Flight Commander
leaders.ability: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: You may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have 6 units that have ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, SPACE CANNON or BOMBARDMENT on the game board.

leaders.name: Mirik Aun Sissiri
leaders.title: Helix Protocol
leaders.ability: ACTION: Move any number of your ships from any systems to any number of other systems that contain 1 of your command tokens and no other players' ships. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Aerie Sentinel
mech.description: This unit does not count against capacity if it is being transported or if it is in a space area with 1 or more of your ships that have capacity values. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Quetzecoatl
flagship.special: Other players cannot use space cannon against your ships in this system.

flavorText: You understand the power of the swift blow, Trilossa. But only when you can direct all of our flocks to dance amongst the stars in perfect harmony will you surpass me.

name: The Empyrean

abilities.name: Voidborn
abilities.description: Nebulae do not affect your ships' movement.

abilities.name: Aetherpassage
abilities.description: After a player activates a system, you may allow that player to move their ships through systems that contain your ships.

abilities.name: Dark Whispers
abilities.description: During setup, take the additional Empyrean faction promissory note; you have 2 faction promissory notes.

promissoryNote.name: Dark Pact
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. When you give a number of commodities to the Empyrean player equal to your maximum commodity value, you each gain 1 trade good. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

promissoryNote.name: Blood Pact
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. When you and the Empyrean player cast votes for the same outcome, cast 4 additional votes for that outcome. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

leaders.name: Acamar
leaders.title: Empyrean Agent
leaders.ability: After a player moves ships into a system that does not contain any planets: You may exhaust this card; that player gains 1 command token.

leaders.name: Xuange
leaders.title: Empyrean Commander
leaders.ability: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 of your command tokens: You may return that token to your reinforcements.
leaders.unlockCondition: Be neighbors with all other players.

leaders.name: Conservator Procyon
leaders.title: Multiverse Shift
leaders.ability: ACTION: Place 1 frontier token in each system that does not contain any planets and does not already have a frontier token. Then, explore each frontier token that is in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Watcher
mech.description: You may remove this unit from a system that contains or is adjacent to another player's units to cancel an action card played by that player. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Dynamo
flagship.special: After any player's unit in this system or an adjacent system uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, you may spend 2 influence to repair that unit.

flavorText: Procyon, the seeker, eldest of the Empyrean. They have mastered the mysteries of dark energy, and thus, they know all possible realities.

name: The Mahact Gene-Sorcerers

abilities.name: Edict
abilities.description: When you win a combat, place 1 command token from your opponent's reinforcements in your fleet pool if it does not already contain 1 of that player's tokens; other player's tokens in your fleet pool increase your fleet limit but cannot be redistributed.

abilities.name: Imperia
abilities.description: While another player's command token is in your fleet pool, you can use the ability of that player's commander, if it is unlocked.

abilities.name: Hubris
abilities.description: During setup, purge your "Alliance" promissory note. Other players cannot give you their "Alliance" promissory note.

promissoryNote.name: Scepter of Dominion
promissoryNote.description: At the start of the strategy phase: Choose 1 non-home system that contains your units; each other player who has a token on the Mahact player's command sheet places a token from their reinforcements in that system. Then, return this card to the Mahact player.

leaders.name: Jae Mir Kan
leaders.title: Mahact Agent
leaders.ability: When you would spend a command token during the secondary ability of a strategic action: You may exhaust this card to remove 1 of the active player's command tokens from the board and use it instead.

leaders.name: Il Na Viroset
leaders.title: Mahact Commander
leaders.ability: During your tactical actions, you can activate systems that contain your command tokens. If you do, return both command tokens to your reinforcements and end your turn.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have 2 other factions' command tokens in your fleet pool.

leaders.name: Airo Shir Aur
leaders.title: Benediction
leaders.ability: ACTION: Move all units in the space area of any system to an adjacent system that contains a different player's ships. Space Combat is resolved in that system; neither player can retreat or resolve abilities that would move their ships. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Starlancer
mech.description: After a player whose command token is in your fleet pool activates this system, you may spend their token from your fleet pool to end their turn; they gain that token. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Arvicon Rex
flagship.special: During combat against an opponent whose command token is not in your fleet pool, apply +2 to the results of this unit's combat rolls.

flavorText: As the army warily approached their foe, the gleaming golden figure raised their hand. Golden light flashed, and the army fell upon itself in wanton slaughter.

name: The Naaz-Rokha Alliance

abilities.name: Distant Suns
abilities.description: When you explore a planet that contains 1 of your mechs, you may draw 1 additional card; choose 1 to resolve and discard the rest.

abilities.name: Fabrication
abilities.description: ACTION: Either purge 2 of your relic fragments of the same type to gain 1 relic; or purge 1 of your relic fragments to gain 1 command token.

promissoryNote.name: Black Market Forgery
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of the same type to gain 1 relic. Then, return this card to the Naaz-Rokha player.

leaders.name: Garv and Gunn
leaders.title: Naaz-Rokha Agent
leaders.ability: At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to explore 1 of their planets.

leaders.name: Dart and Tai
leaders.title: Naaz-Rokha Commander
leaders.ability: After you gain control of a planet that was controlled by another player: You may explore that planet.

leaders.name: Hesh and Prit
leaders.title: Perfect Synthesis
leaders.ability: ACTION: Gain 1 relic and perform the secondary ability of up to 2 readied or unchosen strategy cards; during this action, spend command tokens from your reinforcements instead of your strategy pool. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Eidolon
mech.description: If this unit is in the space area of the active system at the start of a space combat, flip this card. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. This card begins the game with this side face up.

flipped.name: Z-Grav Eidolon
flipped.description: If this unit is in the space area of the active system, it is also a ship. At the end of a space battle in the active system, flip this card. This card begins the game with this side face down.

flagship.name: Visz el Vir
flagship.special: Your mechs in this system roll 1 additional die during combat.

flavorText: What the two of us have created here is going to ensure the rest of the galaxy never underestimates the Naaz and Rokha again.

name: The Nomad

abilities.name: The Company
abilities.description: During setup, take the 2 additional Nomad faction agents and place them next to your faction sheet; you have 3 agents.

abilities.name: Future Sight
abilities.description: During the Agenda phase, after an outcome that you voted for or predicted is resolved, gain 1 trade good.

promissoryNote.name: The Cavalry
promissoryNote.description: At the start of a space combat against a player other than the Nomad: During this combat, treat 1 of your non-fighter ships as if it has the SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability, combat value, and ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE value of the Nomad's flagship. Return this card to the Nomad player at the end of this combat.

leaders.name: Artuno the Betrayer
leaders.title: Nomad Agent
leaders.ability: When you gain trade goods from the supply: You may exhaust this card to place an equal number of trade goods on this card. When this card readies, gain the trade goods on this card.

leaders.name: Field Marshal Mercer
leaders.title: Nomad Agent
leaders.ability: At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove up to 2 of their ground forces from the game board and place them on planets they control in the active system.

leaders.name: The Thundarian
leaders.title: Nomad Agent
leaders.ability: After the "Roll Dice" step of combat: You may exhaust this card. If you do, hits are not assigned to either players' units. Return to the start of this combat round's "Roll Dice" step.

leaders.name: Navarch Feng
leaders.title: Nomad Commander
leaders.ability: You can produce your flagship without spending resources.

leaders.name: Ahk-Syl Siven
leaders.title: Probability Matrix
leaders.ability: ACTION: Place this card near the game board; your flagship and units it transports can move out of systems that contain your command tokens during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

mech.name: Quantum Manipulator
mech.description: While this unit is in a space area during combat, you may use its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability to cancel a hit that is produced against your ships in this system. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Memoria
flagship.special: You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain one or more of your mechs.

flavorText: Nothing yet. There is naught here but dust.

name: The Titans of Ul

abilities.name: Terragenesis
abilities.description: After you explore a planet that does not have a sleeper token, you may place or move 1 sleeper token onto that planet.

abilities.name: Awaken
abilities.description: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your sleeper tokens, you may replace each of those tokens with 1 PDS from your reinforcements.

abilities.name: Coalescence
abilities.description: If your flagship or your AWAKEN faction ability places your units into the same space area or onto the same planet as another player's units, your units must participate in combat during "Space Combat" or "Ground Combat" steps.

promissoryNote.name: Terraform
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 1 and it is treated as having all 3 planet traits (Cultural, Hazardous, and Industrial).

leaders.name: Tellurian
leaders.title: Titans Agent
leaders.ability: When a hit is produced against a unit: You may exhaust this card to cancel that hit.

leaders.name: Tungstantus
leaders.title: Titans Commander
leaders.ability: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may gain 1 trade good.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have 5 structures on the game board.

leaders.name: Ul The Progenitor
leaders.title: Geoform
leaders.ability: ACTION: Ready Elysium and attach this card to it. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 3, and it gains the SPACE CANNON 5 (x3) ability as if it were a unit.

mech.name: Hecatoncheires
mech.description: DEPLOY: When you would place a PDS on a planet, you may place 1 mech and 1 infantry on that planet instead. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Ouranos
flagship.special: DEPLOY: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your PDS, you may replace 1 of those PDS with this unit.

flavorText: Even now, we search the galaxy to awaken our slumbering kin. But there is one other greater than any of us, and it is time they slept no longer.

name: The Vuil'Raith Cabal

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Capture your opponent's non-structure units that are destroyed during combat.

abilities.name: Amalgamation
abilities.description: When you produce a unit, you may return 1 captured unit of that type to produce that unit without spending resources.

abilities.name: Riftmeld
abilities.description: When you research a unit upgrade technology, you may return 1 captured unit of that type to ignore all of the technology's prerequisites.

promissoryNote.name: Crucible
promissoryNote.description: After you activate a system: Your ships do not roll for gravity rifts during this movement; apply an additional +1 to the move values of your ships that would move out of or through a gravity rift instead. Then, return this card to the Vuil'raith player.

leaders.name: The Stillness of Stars
leaders.title: Vuil'Raith Agent
leaders.ability: After another player replenishes commodities: You may exhaust this card to convert their commodities to trade goods and capture 1 unit from their reinforcements that has a cost equal to or lower than their commodity value.

leaders.name: That Which Molds Flesh
leaders.title: Vuil'Raith Commander
leaders.ability: When you produce fighter or infantry units: Up to 2 of those units do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

leaders.name: It Feeds on Carrion
leaders.title: Dimensional Anchor
leaders.ability: ACTION: Each other player rolls a die for each of their non-fighter ships that are in or adjacent to a system that contains a dimensional tear; on a 1-3, capture that unit. If this causes a player's ground forces or fighters to be removed, also capture those units. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Reanimator
mech.description: When your infantry on this planet are destroyed, place them on your faction sheet; those units are captured. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: The Terror Between
flagship.special: Capture all other non-structure units that are destroyed in this system, including your own.

flavorText: The Vuil'raith had glutted themselves on a score of unfortunate worlds. Now it would return the consumed to an unprepared and unsuspecting galaxy.

name: The Council Keleres

abilities.name: The Tribunii
abilities.description: During setup, choose an unplayed faction from among the Mentak, the Xxcha and The Argent Flight; take that faction's home system, command tokens and control markers. Additionally, take the Keleres Hero that corresponds to that faction.

abilities.name: Council Patronage
abilities.description: Replenish your commodities at the start of the strategy phase, then gain 1 trade good.

abilities.name: Law's Order
abilities.description: You may spend 1 influence at the start of your turn to treat all laws as blank until the end of your turn.

startingTechChoice: Choose 2 non-faction technologies owned by other players.
homeSystem: Dependent on Tribunii choice (Mentak tile-2, Xxcha tile-15, or Argent tile-58)

promissoryNote.name: Keleres Rider
promissoryNote.description: After an agenda is revealed: You cannot vote on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome of this agenda. If your prediction is correct, draw 1 action card and gain 2 trade goods. Then, return this card to the Keleres player.

leaders.name: Xander Alexin Victori III
leaders.title: Keleres Agent
leaders.ability: At any time: You may exhaust this card to allow any player to spend commodities as if they were trade goods.

leaders.name: Suffi An
leaders.title: Keleres Commander
leaders.ability: After you perform a component action: You may perform an additional action.
leaders.unlockCondition: Spend 1 trade good after you play an action card that has a component action.

leaders.name: Kuuasi Aun Jalatai
leaders.title: Overwing Zeta
leaders.ability: At the start of a round of space combat in a system that contains a planet you control: Place your flagship and up to a total of 2 cruisers and/or destroyers from your reinforcements in the active system. Then, purge this card.

leaders.name: Odlynn Myrr
leaders.title: Operation Archon
leaders.ability: After an agenda is revealed: You may cast up to 6 additional votes on this agenda. Predict aloud an outcome for this agenda. For each player that votes for another outcome, gain 1 trade good and 1 command token. Then, purge this card.

leaders.name: Harka Leeds
leaders.title: Erwan's Covenant
leaders.ability: ACTION: Reveal cards from the action card deck until you reveal 3 action cards that have component actions. Draw those cards and shuffle the rest back into the action card deck. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Omniopiares
mech.description: Other players must spend 1 influence to commit ground forces to the planet that contains this unit. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Artemiris
flagship.special: Other players must spend 2 influence to activate the system that contains this ship.

flavorText: Pax Magnifica, bellum gloriosum.

name: The Crimson Rebellion

abilities.name: Sundered
abilities.description: You cannot use wormholes other than epsilon wormholes. Other players' units that move or are placed into your home system are destroyed.

abilities.name: Incursion
abilities.description: When you activate a system that contains a breach, you may flip that breach; systems that contain active breaches are adjacent. At the end of the status phase, any player with ships in a system that contain an active breach may remove that breach.

abilities.name: The Sorrow
abilities.description: When you create the game board, place the Sorrow (tile 94) where your home system would normally be placed, then place an inactive breach there. The Sorrow is not a home system. Then, place your home system (tile 118) in your play area.

startingTechChoice: Choose one red or blue technology with no prerequisites.

promissoryNote.name: Sever
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Place this card faceup in your play area, and place the sever token in a system that contains your units; wormholes in that system have no effect during movement. Remove the sever token and return this card to the Rebellion player at end of the status phase.

leaders.name: Ahk Ravin
leaders.title: Crimson Rebellion Agent
leaders.ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose 1 player. That player may swap the position of 2 of their ships in any systems; they may transport units when they swap.

leaders.name: Ahk Siever
leaders.title: Crimson Rebellion Commander
leaders.ability: At the end of a combat between any players: Gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.
leaders.unlockCondition: Place a breach token in a system that contains another player's unit.

leaders.name: Homesick Phantom
leaders.title: Fragment Reality
leaders.ability: When you produce ships: You may place any of those ships on this card. At the start of a space combat, you may purge this card to place all ships from this card into the active system.

mech.name: Revenant
mech.description: DEPLOY: During the "Commit Ground Forces" step of your tactical action in a system that contains an active breach, you may commit 1 mech, even if you have no units in the system. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Quietus
flagship.special: While this unit is in a system that contains an active breach, other players' units in systems with active breaches lose all their unit abilities.

flavorText: We're picking up heat signatures from over thirty C- and B-class vessels! I think they are Creuss. Weâ€”

name: The Deepwrought Scholarate

abilities.name: Research Team
abilities.description: When ground forces are committed, if your units on the planet are not already coexisting, you may choose for your units to coexist.

abilities.name: Oceanbound
abilities.description: When your units begin coexisting on a planet, gain an ocean card and ready it. Any time you have more ocean cards than there are planets that have your coexisting units, discard ocean cards until you do not.

promissoryNote.name: Share Knowledge
promissoryNote.description: ACTION: Place this card faceup in your play area and gain 1 non-faction, non-unit upgrade technology that the Deepwrought player owns; place that technology on this card. Return that technology to the deck and this card to the Deepwrought player at the end of the status phase.

leaders.name: Doctor Carrina
leaders.title: Deepwrought Agent
leaders.ability: When another player researches a technology: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to ignore 1 prerequisite; if they do, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements into coexistence on a non-home planet they control.

leaders.name: Aello
leaders.title: Deepwrought Commander
leaders.ability: When another player spends resources to research a technology: That player may reduce the cost by 1, if they do, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have an ocean card in play.

leaders.name: Ta Zern
leaders.title: Wave Function Collapse
leaders.ability: ACTION: Purge this card and a non-unit upgrade technology you own or from your deck; then, purge all cards with the same name owned by other players and in other players' decks. Then, each player that purged a technology they owned researches another technology.

mech.name: Eanautic
mech.description: When another player activates this system, if this unit is coexisting, you may move it and any of your infantry on its planet to a planet you control in your home system. SUSTAIN DAMAGE. PRODUCTION 1.

flagship.name: D.W.S. Luminous
flagship.special: This ship can move through systems that contain your units, even if other players' units are present; if it would, apply +1 to its move value for each of those systems.

flavorText: Ikatena was not Ta Zern's home. It was not the home of any Hylar, for that matter. But it represented a shift. A change for his people. A necessary one, if they were to survive this new age.

name: The Firmament / The Obsidian

abilities.name: Plots Within Plots
abilities.description: You can score secret objectives already scored by other players, if you fulfill their requirements; This does not count against your secret objective limit or the number you can score in a round. When you score another player's secret objective do not score a victory point. Instead, place a face down plot card into your play area with that player's control token on it.

abilities.name: Puppets of the Blade
abilities.description: If you have at least one plot card in your play area, gain the following ability: ACTION: Purge the Firmament's faction sheet, leaders, planet card, and promissory note, then gain all of the faction components for The Obsidian.

startingTechChoice: Choose one green or yellow technology that has no prerequisites.

promissoryNote.name: Black Ops
promissoryNote.description: When you receive this card: If you are not The Firmament, the Firmament player may place 1 facedown plot card in their play area with your control token on it. Then, gain 2 command tokens, gain 2 trade goods, and purge this card.

leaders.name: Myru Vos
leaders.title: Firmament Agent
leaders.ability: When a player moves ships: You may exhaust this card; if you do, SPACE CANNON cannot be used against those ships. If they are not transporting units, they can also move through other players' ships.

leaders.name: Captain Aroz
leaders.title: Firmament Commander
leaders.ability: You may treat planets in systems that contain your ships as if you controlled them for the purpose of scoring secret objectives.
leaders.unlockCondition: Have one plot card in play.

leaders.name: Sharsiss
leaders.title: The Blade Beckons
leaders.ability: ACTION: Place 1 of your plot cards in play with any other player's control token on it. Then, you may place any player's control token on 1 of your in-play plot cards; one plot cannot have two of the same player's tokens. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Viper EX-23
mech.description: When ground forces are committed to this planet, you may choose for your units to coexist, if they were not already. Flip this card if your faction becomes the Obsidian. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Heaven's Eye
flagship.special: If the Active System contains units that belong to a player who has a Control Token on one of your Plots, apply +1 to this ship's move value and repair it at the end of every Combat Round.

abilities.name: Nocturne
abilities.description: This faction cannot be chosen during setup.

abilities.name: The Blade's Orchestra
abilities.description: When this faction comes into play, flip your home system, double sided faction components and all of your in-play plot cards. Then, ready Cronos Hollow and Tallin Hollow if you control them.

abilities.name: Marionettes
abilities.description: The player or players whose control tokens are on each plot card are the puppeted players for that plot.

promissoryNote.name: Malevolency
promissoryNote.description: At the end of one of your tactical actions: Spend 1 Influence to give this card to 1 of your neighbors; you can use this ability even if you are The Obsidian player. At the end of the status phase, if you are not the Obsidian player, remove 1 command token from your fleet pool and return it to your reinforcements.

leaders.name: Vos Hollow
leaders.title: Obsidian Agent
leaders.ability: When a player's ship is destroyed during any combat: You may exhaust this card; If you do, that player's opponent must destroy one of their ships of the same type in the active system.

leaders.name: Aroz Hollow
leaders.title: Obsidian Commander
leaders.ability: Apply +1 to the result of each of your units' combat rolls in The Fracture.

leaders.name: Sharsiss Hollow
leaders.title: The Blade Revealed
leaders.ability: ACTION: Ready all of your planets. Then, purge this card.

mech.name: Viper Hollow
mech.description: If this unit was coexisting when this card flipped to this side, gain control of its planet; the other player's units are now coexisting. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: Sharsiss turned the point toward himself and plunged the splinted Obsidian into his own chest. It glittered. Sharsiss smiled.

name: Last Bastion

abilities.name: Liberate
abilities.description: When you gain control of a planet, ready that planet if it contains a number of your infantry equal to or greater than that planet's resource value; otherwise, place 1 infantry on that planet.

abilities.name: Galvanize
abilities.description: When a game effect instructs a player to galvanize a unit, they place a galvanize token beneath it, if it does not have one. Galvanized units roll 1 additional die for combat rolls and unit abilities.

abilities.name: Phoenix Standard
abilities.description: At the end of combat, you may galvanize 1 of your units that participated.

startingTechChoice: Choose 1 blue or yellow technology with no prerequisites.

promissoryNote.name: Raise the Standard
promissoryNote.description: At the end of a combat: Galvanize 1 of your units that participated. Then, return this card to the Last Bastion player.

leaders.name: Dame Briar
leaders.title: Last Bastion Agent
leaders.ability: When a player's unit is destroyed: You may exhaust this card to galvanize another of that player's units in the destroyed unit's system.

leaders.name: Nip and Tuck
leaders.title: Last Bastion Commander
leaders.ability: Your action cards cannot be canceled by "Sabotage" action cards. The Nekro Virus cannot place assimilator tokens on your components.
leaders.unlockCondition: There are 3 galvanized units on the game board.

leaders.name: Lyra Keen
leaders.title: Entity 4X41A "Apollo"
leaders.ability: When one of your galvanized units is destroyed: You may purge this card to roll 1 die for each unit in its system that belongs to another player; if the result is equal to or greater than the galvanized unit's combat value, destroy that unit.

mech.name: A3 Valiance
mech.description: When this unit is destroyed, if it was galvanized, galvanize up to 3 of your infantry in its system. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: The Egeiro
flagship.special: Apply +1 to the results of each of this unit's combat rolls for each non-home system that contains a planet you control.

flavorText: Icon floated above Lyra's right shoulder, quiet, as if lost in thought. 'I can do it. But you may die during the process.' Lyra nodded. 'It will be worth the risk.'

name: The Ral Nel Consortium

abilities.name: Survival Instinct
abilities.description: After a player activates a system that contains your ships, you may move up to 2 of your ships into the active system from adjacent systems that do not contain your command tokens.

abilities.name: Miniaturization
abilities.description: Your structures can be transported by any ships; this does not require or count against capacity. While your structures are in the space area, they cannot use their unit abilities. At the end of your tactical action, you may place your structures that are in space areas onto planets you control in their respective systems.

startingTechChoice: Choose 1 red or green technology with no prerequisites.

promissoryNote.name: Nano-Link Permit
promissoryNote.description: After you activate a system: You may move your structures from adjacent systems that do not contain your command tokens onto planets you control in the active system. Then, return this card to the Ral Nel player.

leaders.name: Kan Kip Rel
leaders.title: Ral Nel Agent
leaders.ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to draw 2 action cards; give 1 of those cards to another player.

leaders.name: Watchful Ojz
leaders.title: Ral Nel Commander
leaders.ability: When you declare a retreat: Immediately retreat up to 2 of your ships from the active system to an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships. Place a command token from your reinforcements into that system.
leaders.unlockCondition: Be the last person to pass during the Action Phase.

leaders.name: Director Nel
leaders.title: Signal Intrusion
leaders.ability: After the last player passes: You may choose to no longer be passed; if you do, gain 2 command tokens, draw 1 action card, and purge this card.

mech.name: Alarum
mech.description: At the end of a round of combat on this planet, you may move up to 2 of your ground forces to this planet from planets in adjacent systems. SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flagship.name: Last Dispatch
flagship.special: When this unit retreats, you may destroy 1 ship in the active system that does not have SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

flavorText: He was the master, the king. There were no limits to Nel's ambition. No rules to be broken, no obstacles to be avoided. Only choice. A matrix of pure, unfettered futures.
